description:

 Pune Corporate Office \\- Mantri
   

  

**Job Purpose**
 Bajaj Finserv Web is a critical component of the companyâ€™s omnipresence strategy. You will be working with Indiaâ€™s largest NBFCâ€™s web technology stack, encompassing over 40 business lines and 230\\+ features, with nearly 500 million traffic and managing over 30,000 webpages.
   

  

 It is an integrated platform offering a portfolio of products covering payments, cards, wallets, loans, deposits, mutual funds, and loans on lifestyle products, ranging from consumer durables to home furnishings.

* Compliance \\& Security

* Compliance with Standards: Maintain compliance with industry standards, legal requirements, and best practices in software development.
* Incident Management: Establish and maintain processes for responding to security incidents and ensuring minimal impact on operations.

* Architecture \\& Design: Work with architects and senior developers to ensure that the software architecture supports scalability, performance, and maintainability.\\|
* Technical Debt Management: Continuously assess and address technical debt, balancing the need for speed with long\\-term system health.
* Tooling \\& Infrastructure: Ensure the development team has access to the right tools, technologies, and infrastructure to be productive and efficient.


**Key Decisions / Dimensions**

 ï‚§â€ƒImplementation of Architectural Recommendations: Execute recommendations for integrating NODE JS and REACT JS within existing architecture to optimize solutions for high traffic with minimal infrastructure.

**Major Challenges**

Elasticsearch)

title: Data Engineer
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 1 May 2025
   

  

**Title**
 Data Engineer
   

  

**Job Description**
 A Data Engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining large\\-scale data systems and infrastructure. Their primary goal is to ensure that data is properly collected, stored, processed, and retrieved to support business intelligence, analytics, and data\\-driven decision\\-making.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and Develop Data Pipelines: Create data pipelines to extract data from various sources, transform it into a standardized format, and load it into a centralized data repository.
* Build and Maintain Data Infrastructure: Design, implement, and manage data warehouses, data lakes, and other data storage solutions.
* Ensure Data Quality and Integrity: Develop data validation, cleansing, and normalization processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
* Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Process Owners: Work with data analysts and business process owners to understand their data requirements and provide data support for their projects.
* Optimize Data Systems for Performance: Continuously monitor and optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Develop and Maintain Data Governance Policies: Create and enforce data governance policies to ensure data security, compliance, and regulatory requirements.


**Experience \\& Skills**
* Hands\\-on experience in implementing, supporting, and administering modern cloud\\-based data solutions (Google BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, Snowflake, etc.).
* Strong programming skills in SQL, Java, and Python.
* Experience in configuring and managing data pipelines using Apache Airflow, Informatica, Talend, SAP BODS or API\\-based extraction.
* Expertise in real\\-time data processing frameworks.
* Strong understanding of Git and CI/CD for automated deployment and version control.
* Experience with Infrastructure\\-as\\-Code tools like Terraform for cloud resource management.
* Good stakeholder management skills to collaborate effectively across teams.
* Solid understanding of SAP ERP data and processes to integrate enterprise data sources.
* Exposure to data visualization and front\\-end tools (Tableau, Looker, etc.).
* Strong command of English with excellent communication skills.

description:
Job Title: Senior Developer
   

  

 Location:
   

  

 Coimbatore, IN Pune, IN
   

  

**Reference No:** 
 3208
   

  

**Office Type:** 
 Office
   

  

**Elevate Your Career with Zalaris**
 Zalaris is a rapidly expanding global leader in Tech HR and payroll solutions.
   

  

 Weâ€™re big enough for you to grow and be a part of an international environment but small enough for you to be visible and truly make a difference.
   

  

 We foster open communication and short decision\\-making paths that encourage creative and innovative thinking.
   

  

 Zalarisâ€™ culture is rooted in values inspired by Nordic working ethos:
 **everyone matters, aiming high and team spirit** 
 . Weâ€™re committed to building a diverse, inclusive, and authentic workplace where everyone brings their own uniqueness. Zalarisâ€™ employees come from different backgrounds, cultures, and walks of life, and we are proud of it.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Senior ABAP HR Developer with strong technical expertise in SAP HCM (HR) modules and hands\\-on experience in SAP UI5/Fiori or Neptune development. The ideal candidate should have participated in at least one full end\\-to\\-end implementation project and possess deep knowledge of Personnel Administration (PA), Organizational Management (OM), Time and Payroll (PY) processes. This role involves designing, developing, and optimizing custom solutions that enhance HR business processes using the latest SAP technologies.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain custom ABAP HR applications including Reports, Enhancements, Interfaces, Conversions, and Forms (RICEF objects).
* Build and support SAP workflows.
* Work closely with functional consultants to gather requirements and translate them into efficient technical solutions.
* Build and maintain custom Fiori/UI5, Neptune applications integrated with SAP HCM backend.
* Optimize performance of ABAP programs and ensure adherence to SAP development best practices.
* Support end\\-to\\-end implementation, from blueprinting to go\\-live and postproduction support.
* Participate in integration projects with SuccessFactors, SAP Portal, or other third party systems.
* Conduct code reviews, provide mentorship to junior developers, and maintain high coding standards.
* Collaborate with Basis, Security, and Functional teams to ensure seamless solution delivery.


**Required Skills And Experience**
* 5\\-10 years of hands\\-on experience in SAP ABAP HR development.
* Strong understanding of SAP HR modules: PA, OM, Time Management, Payroll (PY), and Benefits.
* Experience developing SAP UI5/Fiori applications and integrating them with ABAP backend services (OData, Gateway).
* At least one full\\-cycle SAP HCM implementation project experience.
* Solid experience in ABAP Objects (OOPs), BAPIs, BADIs, User Exits, and
* Enhancements Framework, Proxy, Idoc.
* Proficiency in Smart Forms, Adobe Forms, and ALV Reports.
* Strong debugging and performance tuning skills.
* Excellent communication and documentation abilities.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Exposure to SAP SuccessFactors integration or SAP HANA environment.
* Experience with SAP Workflow related to HR processes.
* Knowledge of SAP RAP model or OData V4 services is an added advantage.
* ABAP certification is preferred.


**What We Offer**
* International working environment
* Friendly and supporting colleagues
* Competitive base salary
* Several additional benefits, like:
+ Health insurance
+ Team building events
+ Coffee, tea and other supplies in the office


 Ready to become part of our team? Join us at Zalaris and be a part of a vibrant, collaborative community of Tech HR and payroll experts dedicated to grow and innovate. \\#team Zalaris

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital â€“ OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Masterâ€™s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.
